Name: pilot_penguin_logistics
Description: Most of the time, Penguin Logistics is known as a delivery company made up of Messengers that will deliver the package to its destination no matter what it takes. However, it is seen that P.L. could also provide other services, from being an armed courier and/or escort to pathfinders and transporters. P.L. also owns many commercial venues, one of which includes a bar in Lungmen named "The Ends of the Earth".
